detaileddescription.para: spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Activate Protocol Feature summary: 'Activate protocol feature {{nowrap feature_digest}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/admin.png#9bf1cec664863bd6aaac0f814b235f8799fb02c850e9aa5da34e8a004bd6518e
sect2.para: {{$action.account}} activates the protocol feature with a digest of {{feature_digest}}.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Cancel Delayed Transaction summary: '{{nowrap canceling_auth.actor}} cancels a delayed transaction'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: {{canceling_auth.actor}} cancels the delayed transaction with id {{trx_id}}.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Delete Account Permission summary: 'Delete the {{nowrap permission}} permission of {{nowrap account}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: Delete the {{permission}} permission of {{account}}.

spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Link Action to Permission summary: '{{nowrap account}} sets the minimum required permission for the {{if type}}{{nowrap type}} action of the{{/if}} {{nowrap code}} contract to {{nowrap requirement}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: {{account}} sets the minimum required permission for the {{if type}}{{type}} action of the{{/if}} {{code}} contract to {{requirement}}.
{{if type}}{{else}}Any links explicitly associated to specific actions of {{code}} will take precedence.{{/if}}
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Create New Account summary: '{{nowrap creator}} creates a new account with the name {{nowrap name}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: {{creator}} creates a new account with the name {{name}} and the following permissions:
owner permission with authority: {{to_json owner}}
active permission with authority: {{to_json active}}
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Assert Protocol Feature Activation summary: 'Assert that protocol feature {{nowrap feature_digest}} has been activated'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/admin.png#9bf1cec664863bd6aaac0f814b235f8799fb02c850e9aa5da34e8a004bd6518e
sect2.para: Assert that the protocol feature with a digest of {{feature_digest}} has been activated.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Deploy Contract ABI summary: 'Deploy contract ABI on account {{nowrap account}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: Deploy the ABI file associated with the contract on account {{account}}.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Deploy Contract Code summary: 'Deploy contract code on account {{nowrap account}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: Deploy compiled contract code to the account {{account}}.

spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Unlink Action from Permission summary: '{{nowrap account}} unsets the minimum required permission for the {{if type}}{{nowrap type}} action of the{{/if}} {{nowrap code}} contract'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: {{account}} removes the association between the {{if type}}{{type}} action of the{{/if}} {{code}} contract and its minimum required permission.
{{if type}}{{else}}This will not remove any links explicitly associated to specific actions of {{code}}.{{/if}}
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Modify Account Permission summary: 'Add or update the {{nowrap permission}} permission of {{nowrap account}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/account.png#3d55a2fc3a5c20b456f5657faf666bc25ffd06f4836c5e8256f741149b0b294f
sect2.para: Modify, and create if necessary, the {{permission}} permission of {{account}} to have a parent permission of {{parent}} and the following authority: {{to_json auth}}
